name: Number Guesser
description: Try to guess a random number between 1 and 100.

name: Hangman
description: Classic word guessing game. Try to guess the word before the hangman is complete.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Play the classic Rock Paper Scissors game against the computer.

name: Quiz Game
description: Test your knowledge with this multiple-choice quiz game.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Classic Tic Tac Toe game. Play against a friend on the same computer.

name: Math Challenge
description: Test your math skills with increasingly difficult problems.

name: Word Scramble
description: Unscramble letters to form valid words.

name: Blackjack
description: Play the classic card game Blackjack against the dealer.

name: Snake
description: Navigate a snake to collect food and grow without hitting the walls or yourself.

name: Text Adventure
description: Embark on a short text-based adventure with multiple paths and endings.

name: Connect Four
description: Classic two-player game where players take turns dropping colored discs into a vertical grid.

name: Pong
description: A simple arcade game simulating table tennis.

name: Tetris
description: The classic falling block puzzle game.

name: Mastermind
description: A code-breaking game where you try to guess a hidden color pattern.

name: Yahtzee
description: A dice game where players roll dice to score combinations.

name: Simon Says
description: A memory game where players must repeat a growing sequence of colors/buttons.

name: Wordle
description: A word guessing game where you get hints after each guess.

name: Tower of Hanoi
description: A mathematical puzzle where you move discs between three pegs.
A sliding tile puzzle game where you combine tiles to reach 2048.

name: Sudoku
description: Number placement puzzle where you fill a 9x9 grid with digits.

name: Flappy Bird
description: A simple arcade game where you navigate a bird through pipes.

name: Anagrams
description: Create words from a set of letters.

name: Typing Speed Test
description: Test your typing speed and accuracy.

name: Memory Match
description: Match pairs of cards from a face-down board.

name: Minesweeper
description: Clear a minefield without detonating any mines.
